alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 11:12PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Very Strong Southwest to West Winds Tonight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts between 50 and 75 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Slopes of the Wind River Mountains, including South Pass at times and the Lander Foothills. * WHEN...Tonight. The winds are expected to decrease around sunrise, but remain windy. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mainly to transportation. Expect control issues with light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Use extreme caution if you must travel over South Pass.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
